idea-plugin.description: an idea devtool. To enhance the entire project with Swagger annotations for both controllers and entity classes, an IDE plugin named "Generate Swagger Annotation" can be conceptualized as follows:Key Features:1. Annotation Detection and Generation Based on Annotation Presence:•Automatically inspects the target class. If it is annotated with @RestController or @Controller, the plugin generates corresponding controller-level Swagger annotations (like @ApiOperation, @ApiResponses, etc.).•For classes without these annotations, it assumes a model entity and generates Swagger model annotations (@ApiModelProperty, etc.).2. Selective Annotation Addition:•Allows users to select specific class names, field names, or method names to pinpoint where they want to add or modify Swagger annotations.•This feature ensures precision in documentation and helps developers focus on annotating exactly what needs clarification or documentation enhancement.3. Auto-population of Documentation Comments:•Comments above methods or fields following a predefined format can be automatically parsed and their content used to populate the value attribute of Swagger annotations like @ApiOperation(value = "Method description") or @ApiModelProperty(value = "Field explanation").•The plugin recognizes common documentation formats such as JavaDoc or simple comments and extracts relevant information like descriptions, example values, data types, or possible errors.Example Workflow:1. Activation: User initiates the "Generate Swagger Annotation" plugin from the IDE's context menu or by right-clicking on the class.2. Selection: The IDE presents a dialog or UI where the user can choose between generating controller or model annotations based on existing class annotations.3. Customization: For detailed customization, users can then select individual elements (class, method, or field) and choose to add or edit Swagger annotations manually or enable auto-population from existing comments.4. Preview & Apply: Before applying changes, the plugin offers a preview of the generated Swagger annotations, allowing for any final adjustments.5. Generation: Once confirmed, the plugin adds the annotations directly to the codebase, enhancing the class or method with Swagger documentation details.By automating this process, developers can efficiently document their RESTful APIs and models, improving the clarity and discoverability for other team members and API consumers alike, without getting bogged down in the manual intricacies of Swagger syntax. idea插件工具包
